item.title: A tour of Singleton design pattern with Golang
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Problem Just imagine we need to build a simple web page to show live subscribers of a Youtube channel. Main object here is “subscriber” so we need a tool (counter) to update number of subscribers in real-time.
